# Introduction

This post a introduction to the package `linreg`. The package can be used to apply multiple linear regression.
The package `linreg` has several methods which are used to print tables and components which belongs to the regression model. The `print()`method outputs the formula and the coefficients of the method.
The `plot()` is used to plot a scatterplot, residuals versus fitted values, and a scale-location plot.
